about_the_game:
The long awaited Director's Cut edition of the game is here! And you can upgrade your game just for some money FREE! Right, AAA companies?
Every players with original game will get free copy of Exit From: Director's Cut

Director's Cut edition includes new graphics redone from scratch, new mechanics, new endings, more variations.

Exit From - is a first-person horror-stealth game with quest and rogue-lite elements where you have to get out of the old Soviet house, which changes every new game.

The main character wakes up from a thunderstorm and does not understand where he is. All the flats are empty and no one is there. You decide to get out, and, over time, you realize that the house is not so empty. Will you be able to get out and not give up??

Features:

  • high Quality Graphics
  • latest Ue5 Technologies Nanite and Lumen
  • disturbing Atmosphere Of the Post-soviet Home
  • physical Interaction With Objects
  • random Generation In Each New Run
  • Achievements will give you special items in your begin room
  • Multiple endings
  • Leaderboards

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain dark and scary sounds and content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content.

name: Exit From: Director's Cut

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit version)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit version)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: You wake up from the noise of thunderstorms, no one there. You are trying to get out and realize that after all you are not alone here... Сan You Exit From?
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian*, Ukrainian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
